ValidationRule.description: BODEV-2714: a validation rule to block other modules to be selected when DAM only is selected in Module Opportunity field.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( OR( ISCHANGED(Module_Opportunity__c), ISNEW() ), INCLUDES(Module_Opportunity__c, "DAM only"),
/* Check if the field contains more than one value selected */ IF(INCLUDES(Module_Opportunity__c, "DAM only"), 1, 0) + IF(INCLUDES(Module_Opportunity__c, "Content Workflow"), 1, 0) + IF(INCLUDES(Module_Opportunity__c, "Studio"), 1, 0) + IF(INCLUDES(Module_Opportunity__c, "Brand Guidelines"), 1, 0) + IF(INCLUDES(Module_Opportunity__c, "Dynamic Asset Transformation"), 1, 0) + IF(INCLUDES(Module_Opportunity__c, "Asset Workflow"), 1, 0) + IF(INCLUDES(Module_Opportunity__c, "Emrays"), 1, 0)+ IF(INCLUDES(Module_Opportunity__c, "CX Omnichannel"), 1, 0) + IF(INCLUDES(Module_Opportunity__c, "CX User Community"), 1, 0) + IF(INCLUDES(Module_Opportunity__c, "Content Operations"), 1, 0)> 1 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When DAM only is selected, you cannot select other modules in Module Opportunity field. Please deselect other modules.
